title: N. Korean Hackers Used Job Lures, Cloud Account Access, and Malware to Steal Millions in Crypto
description: The North Korea-linked threat actor known as UNC4899 has been attributed to attacks targeting two different organizations by approaching their employees via LinkedIn and Telegram.
